description_for_human: Organize your Google Drive files automatically using AI. Upload files with natural language descriptions and let AI find the perfect folder.
description_for_model: A free, open-source web application that uses AI to automatically organize files in Google Drive. When users upload a file with a natural language description, the AI analyzes the description, filename, and existing folder structure to place the file in the most appropriate location. Features include: AI-powered file organization, smart folder suggestions, Google Drive OAuth integration, folder structure visualization, and self-hosting capability. The tool is completely free and can be self-hosted on Railway, Vercel, or any Node.js platform.
